mpl colormaps

This page gives an overview of the colormaps generated as potential replacements for matplotlib's default, jet.

Introduction

Colormaps

How to generate

  1. Install the pycam02ucs package.
  2. Check out and run any of the colormap scripts.

To explore any other colormap:

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from pycam02ucs.cm.viscm import viscm

viscm('jet')

plt.show()
